vote.title: To amend various provisions of Title 34 of the Columbus City Codes to address necessary code clean-up.
vote.description:
Explanation
 
BACKGROUND:
 
The Columbus Zone In Initiative (“Zone In”), a multi-phase effort to update the City’s zoning code and Official Zoning Map, began with Phase One implementation on July 29, 2024, with City Council rezoning approximately 12,300 parcels into newly created mixed use districts, and enacting Title 34, the 2024 Zoning Code, which defines and provides development standards for the new districts. After having worked with Title 34 for over nine months, it has been determined that an update to the code is necessary to incorporate minor revisions and clarifications to facilitate the development that was envisioned by these mixed use districts.  
  
FISCAL IMPACT:
 
No funding is required for this legislation.
 
Title
 
To amend various provisions of Title 34 of the Columbus City Codes to address necessary code clean-up.  
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, Columbus embarked on the Zone In initiative with the goal of creating a more effective, equitable, and sustainable framework for guiding land use, development, and growth; and
 
WHEREAS, Phase One of Zone In was implemented on July 29, 2024, with City Council rezoning approximately 12,300 parcels into newly created mixed use districts, and enacting Title 34, the 2024 Zoning Code, which defines and provides development standards for the new districts; and
 
WHEREAS, it has become necessary in the usual daily operation of the Department of Building and Zoning Services to make revisions to Title 34 in order to facilitate the development that was envisioned by these mixed use districts; NOW, THEREFORE,
 
BE IT ORDAINED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS:
 
SECTION 1. That Sections B.20.020, B.30.050, B.40.020, E.20.030, E.20.040, E.20.050, E.20.060, E.20.070, E.20.080, E.20.090, E.20.100, E.20.110, E.20.120, F.20.020, F.20.030, F.30.050, F.30.060, F.30.070, F.40.030, G.20.040, G.20.060, G.30.020, G.30.050, and G.30.080 of Title 34 shall be amended as provided for in the attachment to this ordinance:
 
See Attachment “ORD#1419-2025_Title 34 Revisions_June 2025”
 
SECTION 2. That existing Sections B.20.020, B.30.050, B.40.020, E.20.030, E.20.040, E.20.050, E.20.060, E.20.070, E.20.080, E.20.090, E.20.100, E.20.110, E.20.120, F.20.020, F.20.030, F.30.050, F.30.060, F.30.070, F.40.030, G.20.040, G.20.060, G.30.020, G.30.050, G.30.070, and G.30.080 of Title 34 are hereby repealed.
 
SECTION 3. That this ordinance shall take effect and be in force from and after the earliest period provided by law.
